text: DE-CIX Istanbul, is a carrier and data center-neutral Internet exchange point (IX or IXP) in Istanbul, Turkey, founded in 2015 by DE-CIX. It is also the only Internet exchange point that connects to both Europe and Asia within the same country. == See also == * List of Internet exchange points == References == Category:Internet exchange points in Turkey Category:Telecommunications in Turkey Category:Internet in Turkey
title: DE-CIX Istanbul
